title: Skipping Divisions Still Possible?
body:
Been Silver for the past two season and after watching some streams and getting a better grasp of the game, I've been playing consistently well. Started S6 in Silver V, currently Silver II and have been in a winning streak (13-1?) OP.GG says that my MMR is at least Gold and I will rise two divisions. 

**TL;DR Is it possible for me to skip my Silver II promos straight to Gold tier? 
op.gg MMR = 1552
Gold V MMR = ~1450**
